name: places/ChIJpZjdxL9YwokRXqZOuwptC5k
formattedAddress: 176 E 77th St, New York, NY 10075, USA
adrFormatAddress: 176 E 77th St, New York, NY 10075-1908, USA

originalText.text: Costly but on par for the area. Courteous staff at both drop off and pickup. Car promptly ready at the pre-agreed upon time in unchanged condition.  No additional charges.

text.text: Costly but on par for the area. Courteous staff at both drop off and pickup. Car promptly ready at the pre-agreed upon time in unchanged condition.  No additional charges.

originalText.text: When we first arrived, the valet told us multiple times that if we arrived an hour early he would make us wait one hour. If we arrived a minute late he would charge us an extra $34. We came 15 minutes early to pick up our car and we were willing to wait. He immediately goes “You’re lucky I’m not busy, otherwise you’d have to wait an hour more.” Unprofessional and discourteous. This location is on 56th St.

originalText.text: Appalling customer service, both at the booth and on the phone. Rude, and not helpful. I was overcharged for an additional hour because the member of the staff was on lunch. I kindly mentioned That I have been waiting and I don’t want to be overcharged. He was so upset with me, and so rude that I had to calm him down and tell him if he was in my shoes he would behave the same way. After speaking to the manager on the phone the staff member TOLD ME that I will be refunded if I pay on card. So I did. I emailed the management - no answer for 4 days, I emailed again and I receive a message saying CALL ME ON.... no “ I am sorry” no nothing. Whoever picked up the phone was not apologetic, in fact his tone was super rude like if he was blaming me for everything that has happened. He told me he didn’t understand my email even though I was very clear. I will be parking somewhere else from now on. STAY AWAY FROM THIS COMPANY, they don’t know how to keep returning customers. Good customer service means good returning customers, this company is definitely lacking it.

originalText.text: The Guy who valets at the W 56th st Saturday night 9/3/2022 is rude and unprofessional. Horrible service. Wish I can rate it 0/5 stars just because of him.
